title: Scientists Eye Potential Culprit Behind Covid-19 Vaccine Allergic Reactions
author: Sarah Toy
description: Scientists are eyeing a potential culprit causing the allergic reactions to the Pfizer and BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine: the compound polyethylene glycol, also known as PEG.
cleaned_text: Updated Dec. 26, 2020 12:01 am ET Scientists are eyeing a potential culprit causing the allergic reactions to the Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE Covid-19 vaccine: the compound polyethylene glycol, also known as PEG.
